name: McOsu
summary: A free open-source circle-clicking rhythm game practice client for osu! beatmaps with Virtual Reality support. McOsu is developed separately from and has no direct affiliation with osu! or ppy Pty Ltd.
info:
• 游戏类型: VR 音乐
  • 开发: McKay
  • 发行: McKay
  • 发行日期: 2017年3月21日
  • 售价: 免费
